text: Jacques Sernas (; sometimes credited as Jack Sernas; 30 July 1925 â€“ 3 July 2015) was a Lithuanian-born French actor with an international movie career. He was known for his roles in Lost Youth, Helen of Troy, The Dirty Game, and in Midas Run. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Lithuanian actors Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:People from Kaunas
